20110112235854.000|20110112235855.000|CC1|THE CHALLENGER TRAGEDY WAS NOT  
20110112235855.000|20110112235856.000|CC1|ABOUT VIOLENCE BUT WAS SHOCKING 
20110112235856.000|20110112235858.000|CC1|AND HORRIBLE AND RONALD REAGAN  
20110112235858.000|20110112235859.000|CC1|PULLED US TOGETHER.             
20110112235859.000|20110112235901.000|CC1|SADLY, PRESIDENT CLINTON HAD TO 
20110112235901.000|20110112235902.000|CC1|DEAL WITH A SIMILAR SITUATION.  
20110112235902.000|20110112235903.000|CC1|NOT IDENTICAL.                  
20110112235903.000|20110112235906.000|CC1|WE STILL DON'T KNOW IF JARED    
20110112235906.000|20110112235907.000|CC1|LOUGHNER WAS REALLY INFLUENCED  
20110112235907.000|20110112235909.000|CC1|BY THE CLIMATE OF HATE AND FEAR 
20110112235909.000|20110112235912.000|CC1|IN OUR COUNTRY.                 
20110112235912.000|20110112235914.000|CC1|IT MAY HAD BEEN UNRELATED.      
20110112235914.000|20110112235915.000|CC1|EXCEPT FOR ONE THING THAT WE DO 
20110112235915.000|20110112235916.000|CC1|KNOW, ED.

20110112235917.000|20110112235919.000|CC1|HE TRIED TO MURDER A

20110112235921.000|20110112235922.000|CC1|FEDERAL JUDGE.

20110112235924.000|20110112235926.000|CC1|AND WHEN YOU BRING YOUR
